
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2024-11-20 22:05:20.872173                #
######################################


#cognitive #leader_trait_army_veteran_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_army_veteran_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_army_veteran }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_army_veteran_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_politician_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_politician_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_politician_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_politician_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_politician_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_politician_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_politician_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_retired_fleet_officer_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}

		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2 } }
	}
	allow = {

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_champion_of_the_people_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {

	}
	allow = {

		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_charismatic }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_charismatic_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_charismatic_2 }

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_feedback_loop }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_feedback_loop_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_trait_ruler_home_in_the_sky

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_industrialist_2_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_industrialist_2 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_industrialist_2
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_industrialist }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_industrialist_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_industrialist_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_logistic_understanding_2
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #trait_ruler_space_miner #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_space_miner_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_space_miner } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_space_miner
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_space_miner }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_space_miner
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_space_miner_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_space_miner }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_trait_ruler_space_miner
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_space_miner
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_cartographer_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_cartographer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_cartographer }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_cartographer_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_cartographer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		has_ancrel = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_biology_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_biology_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_biology }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_biology_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_biology_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_field_manipulation }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_field_manipulation_3
		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_military_theory }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_military_theory_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_new_worlds_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_expertise_particles_3 #veteran

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_particles_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_particles_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_particles }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_particles_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_particles_3 }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_psionics }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3 }

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_science_communicator }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_science_communicator_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_science_communicator_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_science_communicator_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_science_communicator_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_science_communicator_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #trait_ruler_expansionist_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_expansionist_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_expansionist_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_trait_ruler_expansionist_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = trait_ruler_expansionist }
			add_trait_no_notify = trait_ruler_expansionist_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_trait_ruler_expansionist_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = trait_ruler_expansionist_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_trait_ruler_expansionist_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				remove_trait = trait_ruler_expansionist_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright #paragon

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_educator }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_educator
		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_great_researcher }

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses }
			add_trait_no_notify = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target = { has_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
